channel.title: 317 Re-factored
channel.description:
Hello and welcome,
I have started a project to refactor a 317 client. I'm going to keep this bit short and keep the content in the rest of the thread!
[I][U]Background[/U][/I] This project started with my love for editing things and seeing the results of your edits. Not to mention my obsession with trying it on the Runescape client :D. I've always wanted to do this, to see how it worked and just to be able to actually read the code and be able to know what it does. So I set out to do so in this project and have been working on it slowly for the past week, just doing it in my spare time for fun. I figured why should I keep this to myself and here I am, sharing it with you all. Now I am not only sharing this, I am willing to accept other people into helping me; read below to figure out how to join!
[I][U]Where to get the source[/U][/I] You can get the source here: [url=https://code.google.com/p/rs2client/]https://code.google.com/p/rs2client/[/url] The projects SVN is open to the public and will remain that way. I believe strongly in helping out others especially in a community such as this.
[I][U]How to Join[/U][/I] Joining the project is really as simple as giving me your email that you use for Google code, and I will be happy to add you to the project. (With a little knowledge of seeing your name, so you don't just join to try and mess things up).
That's it short and sweet, I'll likely update this soon!
Thanks for reading!

@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

[quote=“locksmin, post:16, topic:326718”]Ok, so let me get this strait your makeing a runescape client that connects to runescape but you getting the graphics and all that to look like 317 but still play runescape. Your trying to get the client to play runescape but in 317 forum

Is that correct? if so thats awsome and if it works i will make sweet sweet love to you!

Lmao[/quote]

This is why drugs are bad.

item.title: 317 Re-factored
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

It’s only to learn not use, so I don’t have a problem with the base. I may never finish it, I have something coming up soon that I may leave this. If I do continue, I plan on commenting.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Re-factored
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hmmm, you should have started with Galkons and removed the added stuff, most of the tiles,ground arrays and 2D stuff is in Peters map editor.
Alot of things are badly renamed, such as the entire texture class but it’s better than nothing.

Also, it’s source code, there should be alot more comments as to what stuff does, especially the methods.
Good luck, and make daily backups, google will take it down as soon as they get the DMCA notice.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Re-factored
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Bryanc:

What do you mean what I have re-factored? If you looked at the code you would know… Plus this would not go in the development section you’re thinking about because that one is for servers not clients.

Tell me, what you have refractored.

And he laughed hard cause you have no idea what your doing. I’m assuming.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc

Why would you laugh at that?

item.title: 317 Re-factored
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Bryanc:

Not too sure if you have even looked at the code, but yes I have been refactoring it fine. I have even more that I haven’t commited yet that I did yesterday. I know it will take time and it doesn’t really matter because I do this in my free time as something fun to do and pass time. It will get done when it gets done, and that may never be. It all depends on my schedule and like I said I have already done more than what you see in the code right now.

I’d like to know what you have refractored. And this would be in developement section.

Read full topic
